title: The area shall be one, contiguous, unbroken and uninterrupted
clause_text: The area shall be one, contiguous, unbroken and uninterrupted. Provided that, such area if divided by one or more water courses (such as nallah, canals, etc.), existing or proposed roads of any width or by railways, pipeline etc., shall be treated as one, contiguous, unbroken and uninterrupted, subject to condition that the Project Proponent/s shall construct necessary connecting roads or bridges as per site requirements at his own cost with due permission from concerned authorities. Integrated Township area may also include;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
